Text: Some "S" noise in the vinyl, not sure if it's in the original audio or vinyl wear ??  I haven't heard any samples of this record where the sharp s-es aren't there. Maybe that's why they didn't include this track in any of the CD releases, that audio engineers didn't think it was good enough audio-wise ? Well pure speculation...

I thought I'd add some more trivia; accompanying Siw here is "Harry Arnold and his Swedish Radio Studio Orchestra".

This song was also recorded instrumental and released as "The Midnight Sun Never Sets" by the same orchestra.

The impressive Siw Malmkvist discography is found here :
http://pagesperso-orange.fr/denis.schwartz/siw.htm
